name: MyDevice’sOpinionofMe
0:
”Alexa, open your opinion”
”Alexa, start your opinion”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your opinion
des: Alexa will tell you her opinion of you. Don’t take it personally, though. Just tell her to shut up, and it’ll all be okay…
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
